page.title: 06Industry The Chilton Estate.
page.content: The Industrial Estate is on the eastern side of Sudbury and northern edge of Cornard alongside the A134 road.It consists of 68 firms the biggest employers being CAV Engineers and Wheelers Woodyards. The Estate contains many warehouses the biggest belonging to Home City,Mander Walsh Lait,India Grange and Bowater.There are also many depots for large firms.The industries are mainly light engineering the biggest factories being Hobart and Willinghale but also contain printing, brewing,medical supplies,garages, textiles,glass and building firms.The estate is linked by a wide ring road and benefits from cheap rates,room for expansion,good communications and labour supply and close proximity to the East coast ports and the London market.A traditional industry in the area is silk at the Walters Mill.
